author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some buggish oversights in the RA get-location-segments
implementation for ra-svn, ra-neon, and ra-serf.

author: lgo
msg: (get_version_url): explain what the function does and how it works.

author: hwright
msg: Improve the Security Space Survey graph by not specifying image dimensions
when we initially create the figure.  Let the post-creation scaling handle that.
(draw_graph): Don't specify a size when creating the figure.

author: hwright
msg: Followup to r27474.  When parsing an optional boolean values in the svnserve
protocol, explicitly cast the value to a svn_boolean_t.  This silences some
Cast optional booleans to svn_boolean_t when we use their values.

author: hwright
msg: Update the Security Space survey for November 2007.
